title: 大家一般喜欢用什么启动器啊
author: TNTcraftHIM
txt_content: 我先说，我用的mcbbs推荐的bakaXL，界面我很喜欢

replies.author: White_i
replies.txt_content: hmcl和用来被PVP大佬虐的狮子端

replies.author: longyajr
replies.txt_content:
还有字数限制吗……
我选择hmcl

replies.author: TNTcraftHIM
replies.txt_content:
longyajr 发表于 2019-8-14 17:01
还有字数限制吗……
我选择hmcl
最近几年的启动器越来越多了

replies.author: ShuraDream
replies.txt_content: hmcl和pcl都行..正版启动器用着不舒服。。下新版本又慢的要死..

replies.author: TNTcraftHIM
replies.txt_content:
